reviewText:
A charming portrait about the affections and memories of an old man (Hector Alterio one of the best Spanish actors ever born) at the eve of his dying lives with her beloved sister when the sudden appearing of a young man in his house becomes motive of permanent invitation for him and then a curious blend of feelings of love and missing partners rekindle and blossom into his distorted mind.

A true Ode to the friendship, so missed specially in these days.
